Class dump 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----dump
public class dump
extends Object
a simple dump program prints the offset, hexvalue, and decimal value for each byte in a file, for all files mentioned on the command line.

Usage: 

   java dump input-file

Author:
Ray Ontko
